allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "\d users.application")
Bash(flyway migrate:*)
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "SELECT application_id, length(application_id) FROM users.application ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "SELECT 
    tc.table_name, 
    kcu.column_name, 
    ccu.table_name AS foreign_table_name,
    ccu.column_name AS foreign_column_name 
FROM 
    information_schema.table_constraints AS tc 
    JOIN information_schema.key_column_usage AS kcu
      ON tc.constraint_name = kcu.constraint_name
      AND tc.table_schema = kcu.table_schema
    JOIN information_schema.constraint_column_usage AS ccu
      ON ccu.constraint_name = tc.constraint_name
      AND ccu.table_schema = tc.table_schema
WHERE tc.constraint_type = ''FOREIGN KEY'' AND ccu.column_name = ''application_id'';")
Bash(make:*)
Bash(curl:*)
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "\d codes.institution")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "
SELECT 
  c.institution_code, 
  c.program_code, 
  c.program_name,
  c.department_code, 
  COUNT(*) as branch_offerings
FROM codes.curriculum c
JOIN codes.branch_institution bi ON c.institution_code = bi.institution_code
GROUP BY c.institution_code, c.program_code, c.program_name, c.department_code
ORDER BY c.institution_code, c.program_code
LIMIT 10;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "\d users.student")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "SELECT application_id, status, academic_year, state_code, district_code, branch_code, institution_code FROM users.application LIMIT 3;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users.application;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -U postgres -h localhost -d vise -c "\d users.sports")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -h localhost -U postgres -d vise -c "\dn+")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -h localhost -U postgres -d vise -c "\dt users.*")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -h localhost -U postgres -d vise -c "SELECT schemaname, tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname IN (''users'', ''codes'') ORDER BY schemaname, tablename;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -h localhost -U postgres -d vise -c "SELECT installed_rank, version, description, success FROM flyway_schema_history ORDER BY installed_rank DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=vise psql -h localhost -U postgres -d vise -c "
SELECT 
    tablename,
    schemaname,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''users'' AND table_name = t.tablename) as column_count
FROM pg_tables t 
WHERE schemaname = ''users'' 
ORDER BY tablename;")
